fists-of-thunder.desc: Generate: 6 Spirit per attackUnleash a series of extremely fast punches that deal 110% weapon damage as Lightning. Every third hit deals damage to all enemies in front of you and knocks them back a short distance. Generates Spirit faster than other Spirit-generating skills due to the high attack speed.

thunderclap.desc: Teleport to the target and release an electric shockwave with every punch that hits all enemies within 6 yards of your primary target for 35% weapon damage as Lightning.

lightning-flash.desc: Increases your chance to Dodge by 16% for 2 seconds.

static-charge.desc: Your primary target is charged with static electricity for 5 seconds and takes 37% weapon damage as Lightning when you attack other enemies with Fists of Thunder.

quickening.desc: Critical Hits generate an additional 15 Spirit for each target hit.

bounding-light.desc: Every third punch releases chain lightning instead of knocking enemies back.  Each lightning strike inflicts 73% weapon damage as Lightning.

lashing-tail-kick.desc: Cost: 30 SpiritUnleash a deadly roundhouse kick that knocks enemies back and deals 235% weapon damage.

vulture-claw-kick.desc: Release a torrent of fire that burns nearby enemies for 259% weapon damage as Fire and causes Knockback.

sweeping-armada.desc: Increases Knockback distance by 150% and slows the movement speed of struck enemies by 60% for 2 seconds.

spinning-flame-kick.desc: Hurl a column of fire that burns through enemies, causing 294% weapon damage as Fire to each enemy it strikes.

scorpion-sting.desc: Enemies have a 50% chance to be stunned for 1.5 seconds instead of being knocked back.

hand-of-ytar.desc: Attack enemies at long range, slowing the movement speed of affected targets by 80% for 2 seconds.

deadly-reach.desc: Generate: 6 Spirit per attackProject lines of pure force over a short distance for 110% weapon damage. Every third hit extends 25 yards.

piercing-trident.desc: Increases the area of effect of the second and third strikes.

keen-eye.desc: The third strike increases your Armor by 50% for 4 seconds.

scattered-blows.desc: The third strike is replaced with an attack that will hit up to 6 nearby enemies within 15 yards for 170% weapon damage as Lightning.

strike-from-beyond.desc: Critical Hits generate an additional 10 Spirit for each target hit.

foresight.desc: The third strike increases the damage of all attacks by 18% for 30 seconds.

blinding-flash.desc: Cost: 10 SpiritCooldown: 15 secondsCreate a flash of light that blinds all enemies within 20 yards for 3 seconds. Elite enemies recover faster, but suffer a 30% chance to miss with attacks.

self-reflection.desc: Increases the duration enemies are blinded to 4 seconds.

blinded-and-confused.desc: Blinded enemies have a 25% chance to attack each other.

blinding-echo.desc: 6 seconds after using Blinding Flash, a second flash of light will blind enemies within 20 yards for 0.5 seconds.

searing-light.desc: Increases the chance elite enemies will miss attacks to 60%.

faith-in-the-light.desc: For 3 seconds after using Blinding Flash, all of your attacks are empowered to deal 30% additional weapon damage as Holy.

tempest-rush.desc: Cost: 15 Spirit plus an additional 10 Spirit while channelingCharge directly through your enemies, knocking them back and hobbling them, slowing their movement by 60% for 2 seconds. Also deals 85% weapon damage while running.

northern-breeze.desc: Reduces the channeling cost of Tempest Rush to 8 Spirit.

tailwind.desc: Increases the movement speed of Tempest Rush by 25%.

flurry.desc: Increases the potency of the hobbling effect, slowing enemy movement by 80%.

slipstream.desc: Reduces damage taken while running by 25%.

bluster.desc: Enemies knocked back have their damage reduced by 20% for the duration of the effect.

breath-of-heaven.desc: Cost: 25 SpiritCooldown: 15 secondsA blast of divine energy heals you and all allies within 12 yards for 6202 - 7442 Life.

circle-of-scorn.desc: Breath of Heaven also sears enemies for 80% weapon damage as Holy.

circle-of-life.desc: Increases the healing power of Breath of Heaven to 8063 - 9675 Life.

blazing-wrath.desc: Breath of Heaven increases the damage of your attacks by 15% for 45 seconds.

infused-with-light.desc: Gain 8 additional Spirit from Spirit generating attacks for 5 seconds after using Breath of Heaven.

penitent-flame.desc: Enemies exposed to Breath of Heaven run away in Fear for 1.5 seconds.

dashing-strike.desc: Cost: 25 SpiritQuickly dash at the targeted enemy or location, striking for 160% weapon damage and rooting the target for 1 second.

way-of-the-falling-star.desc: After striking an enemy, your movement speed is increased 25% for 3 seconds.

flying-side-kick.desc: Perform a flying kick that has a 60% chance to Stun your target for 1.5 seconds.

quicksilver.desc: Reduces the cost of Dashing Strike to 10 Spirit.

soaring-skull.desc: Launch yourself through the air and slow all enemies along your path by 60% for 2 seconds.

blinding-speed.desc: Receive a 20% increased chance to Dodge for 3 seconds.

crippling-wave.desc: Generate: 7 Spirit per attackUnleash a series of large sweeping attacks that cause 110% weapon damage to all enemies in front of you. Every third hit damages all enemies around you and dazes them, slowing their movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

concussion.desc: Enemies hit by Crippling Wave inflict 20% less damage for 3 seconds.

rising-tide.desc: Critical Hits generate an additional 5 Spirit for each target hit.

tsunami.desc: The range of Crippling Wave's third strike is increased to 17 yards and the effect of the movement speed reduction is increased to 60%.

breaking-wave.desc: Enemies hit by Crippling Wave take 10% additional damage from all attacks for 3 seconds.

wave-of-light.desc: Cost: 75 SpiritFocuses a wave of light that crushes enemies for 390% weapon damage as Holy, followed by an additional 45% weapon damage as Holy to all enemies in a line.

wall-of-light.desc: Increases damage of the initial strike to 566% weapon damage as Holy.

explosive-light.desc: Release bursts of energy that deal 430% weapon damage as Holy to nearby enemies.

empowered-wave.desc: Reduces the cost of Wave of Light to 40 Spirit.

blinding-light.desc: Critical Hits Stun enemies for 3 seconds.

pillar-of-the-ancients.desc: Summon an ancient pillar that deals 280% weapon damage followed by an additional 280% weapon damage after 2 seconds.

exploding-palm.desc: Cost: 40 SpiritCause a target to Bleed for 745% weapon damage as Physical over 9 seconds. If the target dies while bleeding, it explodes and deals 30% of the target's maximum Life as Physical damage to all nearby enemies.

the-flesh-is-weak.desc: Also causes the target to take 12% additional damage for 9 seconds.

strong-spirit.desc: If the target explodes after bleeding, gain 5 Spirit for each enemy caught in the blast.

creeping-demise.desc: Also reduces your target's movement speed by 80% for 3 seconds.

impending-doom.desc: Increases the duration of the Bleed effect to deal 745% weapon damage as Physical over 15 seconds.

essence-burn.desc: Instead of bleeding, the target will burn for 745% weapon damage as Fire over 9 seconds. If the target dies while burning, it explodes causing all nearby enemies to burn for 60% weapon damage as Fire over 3 seconds. This effect can happen multiple times.

cyclone-strike.desc: Cost: 50 SpiritPull all enemies within 24 yards towards you, followed by a furious blast of energy that deals 100% weapon damage as Holy.

eye-of-the-storm.desc: Reduces the Spirit cost of Cyclone Strike to 30 Spirit.

implosion.desc: Increases the distance enemies will be pulled towards you to 34 yards.

sunburst.desc: Changes the blast into an explosion of fire that has a 35% chance to Fear enemies for 1.5 seconds.

wall-of-wind.desc: After using Cyclone Strike, gain a 20% chance to dodge attacks for 3 seconds.

soothing-breeze.desc: Cyclone Strike heals you and all allies within 24 yards for 1240 Life.

way-of-the-hundred-fists.desc: Generate: 8 Spirit per attackUnleash a rapid series of punches that strikes enemies for 140% weapon damage.

hands-of-lightning.desc: Increases the number of hits in the second strike from 7 to 10.

blazing-fists.desc: Critical Hits increase your attack speed and movement speed by 5% for 5 seconds. This effect can stack up to 3 times.

fists-of-fury.desc: Affected targets will take an additional 100% weapon damage as Holy over 5 seconds. Also adds a short dash to the first strike.

spirited-salvo.desc: Every activation of the skill has a 15% chance to generate 15 additional Spirit.

windforce-flurry.desc: The third strike generates a wave of wind that deals 250% weapon damage as Physical to enemies directly ahead of you.

serenity.desc: Cost: 10 SpiritCooldown: 20 secondsYou are enveloped in a protective shield that absorbs all incoming damage for 3 seconds and grants immunity to all control impairing effects.

peaceful-repose.desc: When activated, Serenity heals you for 6202 - 7752 Life.

reap-what-is-sown.desc: When Serenity ends, the shield explodes, dealing 30% of the damage absorbed by Serenity as Holy damage to enemies within 20 yards. The damage to each enemy cannot exceed 100% of your maximum Life.

tranquility.desc: Extends the protective shield to allies within 45 yards for 1 seconds, and makes them immune to control impairing effects like Slow and Frozen.

ascension.desc: Increases the duration of Serenity to 4 seconds.

instant-karma.desc: While Serenity is active, 50% of all projectiles and melee attacks are reflected back at the attacker.

sevensided-strike.desc: Cost: 50 SpiritCooldown: 30 secondsDash rapidly between nearby enemies, dealing 1777% weapon damage over 7 hits.

sudden-assault.desc: Teleport to the target, increasing damage done to 2310% weapon damage over 7 strikes.

severalsided-strike.desc: Increases the number of strikes to 9.

pandemonium.desc: Enemies hit by Seven-Sided Strike have a 25% chance to be stunned for 7 seconds by each hit.

sustained-attack.desc: Reduces the cooldown of Seven-Sided Strike to 23 seconds.

fulminating-onslaught.desc: Each strike explodes, dealing 254% weapon damage as Holy in a 7 yard radius around the target.

mantra-of-evasion.desc: Cost: 50 SpiritRecite a Mantra that grants you and your allies within 40 yards a 15% chance to dodge attacks for 3 minutes.For 3 seconds after activation, a second effect grants an additional 15% chance to dodge attacks.This is a Mantra. You can only have one Mantra active at a time.

hard-target.desc: Mantra of Evasion also increases Armor by 20%.

divine-protection.desc: When you or an ally under the effect of Mantra of Evasion is reduced below 25% Life, a shield of protection forms around that target, reducing damage taken by 80% for 3 seconds. Each target can be protected at most once every 90 seconds by this effect.

wind-through-the-reeds.desc: Mantra of Evasion also increases movement speed by 8%.

perseverance.desc: Mantra of Evasion also reduces the duration of all control impairing effects like Slow or Frozen by 20%.

backlash.desc: Successfully dodging an attack has a chance to create a burst of flame dealing 35% weapon damage as Fire to all nearby enemies.

sweeping-wind.desc: Cost: 75 SpiritSurround yourself in a vortex that continuously deals 15% weapon damage to all enemies within 10 yards. The vortex lasts 6 seconds and is refreshed each time you strike an enemy with a melee attack. Landing a Critical Hit has a chance to increase the vortex effect up to 2 times for a total of 45% weapon damage to nearby enemies.

master-of-wind.desc: Increases the duration of the vortex to 20 seconds.

blade-storm.desc: Intensify the vortex, increasing the damage per stack to 20% weapon damage. This increases the damage with 3 stacks to 60% weapon damage.

fire-storm.desc: Increases the radius of the vortex to 14 yards and changes the damage dealt to Fire.

inner-storm.desc: As long as your vortex is at the maximum stack count, you gain 3 Spirit per second.

cyclone.desc: While your vortex is at the maximum stack count, Critical Hits have a chance to spawn a lightning tornado that periodically electrocutes nearby enemies for 20% weapon damage as Lightning. Each spawned lightning tornado lasts 3 seconds.

mantra-of-retribution.desc: Cost: 50 SpiritRecite a Mantra that causes you and your allies within 40 yards to reflect melee damage back at enemies, dealing Holy damage equal to 40% of the damage sustained. The effect lasts for 3 minutes.For 3 seconds after activation, the effect on you increases to 80% of the damage sustained.This is a Mantra. You can only have one Mantra active at a time.

retaliation.desc: Increases the amount of damage reflected by the Mantra to 60%. The Mantra will now reflect ranged damage as well as melee damage.

transgression.desc: Increases attack speed for you and your allies by 8%.

indignation.desc: When taking damage from the Mantra of Retribution, enemies have a 10% chance to be stunned for 2 seconds.

against-all-odds.desc: When reflecting damage done to you, Mantra of Retribution has a chance to restore 3 Spirit.

collateral-damage.desc: An attacker that is damaged by Mantra of Retribution has a 30% chance to suffer a feedback blast, dealing 45% weapon damage as Holy to itself and nearby enemies.

inner-sanctuary.desc: Cost: 30 SpiritCooldown: 20 secondsCreate a runic circle of protection on the ground for 5 seconds that cannot be passed by enemies.

safe-haven.desc: You and your allies standing in the area of effect of Inner Sanctuary regenerate 1550 Life per second.

sanctified-ground.desc: When Inner Sanctuary expires, it becomes sanctified ground for 6 seconds, slowing the movement of all enemies that move through it by 60%.

consecration.desc: Increases the duration of Inner Sanctuary to 7 seconds.

circle-of-protection.desc: You and your allies standing in the area of effect of Inner Sanctuary take 35% less damage.

forbidden-palace.desc: You and your allies standing in the area of effect of Inner Sanctuary deal 10% additional damage.

mystic-ally.desc: Cost: 25 SpiritSummon a mystic ally to fight alongside you until it is destroyed. The ally deals 40% of your weapon damage as Physical per swing.

water-ally.desc: Imbue the ally with the essence of water. The ally gains the ability to perform a wave attack that deals 120% of your weapon damage as Physical and slows the movement of affected targets by 30% for 2 seconds.

fire-ally.desc: Imbue the ally with the essence of fire. The ally gains the ability to unleash a flaming kick for 80% weapon damage as Fire plus an additional 40% of your weapon damage per second as Fire for 2 seconds to all enemies in a straight line.

air-ally.desc: Imbue the ally with the essence of air. Every attack made by the ally has a 2% chance to generate 100 Spirit for you. In addition, the ally is surrounded in a torrent of wind that deals 10% of your weapon damage per second as Physical to all nearby enemies.

eternal-ally.desc: Imbue the ally with the essence of life. When the ally dies, it has a 50% chance to be reborn after 5 seconds. In addition, the physical damage of the ally's basic attack is increased to 44% of your weapon damage per swing.

earth-ally.desc: Imbue the ally with the essence of earth. Maximum Life for you and the ally is increased by 10%. The ally also gains the ability to create a wave of earth, dealing 60% of your weapon damage as Physical to a single enemy and forcing that enemy to attack the ally for 3 seconds.

mantra-of-healing.desc: Cost: 50 SpiritRecite a Mantra that causes you and your allies within 40 yards to gain increased Life regeneration by 310 Life per second. The Mantra lasts 3 minutes.For 3 seconds after activation Mantra of Healing shrouds you and your allies with a mystical shield that absorbs up to 930 damage.This is a Mantra. You can only have one Mantra active at a time.

sustenance.desc: Increases the Life regeneration granted by Mantra of Healing to 620 Life per second.

circular-breathing.desc: Mantra of Healing also regenerates 3 Spirit per second.

boon-of-inspiration.desc: Mantra of Healing also heals 186 Life when hitting an enemy.

heavenly-body.desc: Mantra of Healing also increases Vitality by 10%.

time-of-need.desc: Mantra of Healing also increases resistances to all damage types by 20%.

mantra-of-conviction.desc: Cost: 50 SpiritRecite a Mantra that causes all enemies within 20 yards of you to take 12% additional damage. The Mantra lasts 3 minutes.For 3 seconds after activation, the effect is increased to 24% additional damage.This is a Mantra. You can only have one Mantra active at a time.

overawe.desc: Increases the strength of Mantra of Conviction so that enemies take 24% additional damage and 48% for the first 3 seconds.

intimidation.desc: Enemies affected by Mantra of Conviction deal 10% less damage.

dishearten.desc: Slows the movement of enemies within 20 yards by 30%.

reclamation.desc: You and your allies have a 30% chance to be healed for 279 - 341 Life when using melee attacks on an enemy under the effects of Mantra of Conviction.

submission.desc: Enemies affected by Mantra of Conviction take 12% weapon damage per second as Holy.

resolve.desc: Damage you deal reduces enemy damage by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

exalted-soul.desc: Increases maximum Spirit by 100 and increases Spirit Regeneration by 1 per second.Spirit fuels your defensive and offensive abilities.

transcendence.desc: Every point of Spirit spent heals you for 62.0 Life.

chant-of-resonance.desc: Duration of all Mantras increased by 7 minutes. While one of your Mantras is active you gain 2 Spirit every second.

seize-the-initiative.desc: Your Armor is increased by 50% of your Dexterity.

the-guardian's-path.desc: While dual-wielding, you gain a 15% chance to dodge incoming attacks. While using a two-handed weapon, all Spirit generation is increased by 35%.

sixth-sense.desc: Your dodge chance is increased by an amount equal to 30% of your Critical Hit Chance.

pacifism.desc: While you are under a Stun, Fear, Immobilize or Charm effect, all damage taken is reduced by 75%.

guiding-light.desc: Whenever you use a direct heal skill on another player you and the other player deal 16% more damage for 15 seconds.

one-with-everything.desc: Your resistance to all elements is equal to your highest elemental resistance.

combination-strike.desc: Each different Spirit Generator ability you use increases your damage by 8% for 3 seconds.

near-death-experience.desc: When receiving fatal damage, you are instead restored to 35% of maximum Life and 35% Spirit.This effect cannot occur more than once every 60 seconds.
